verses.verse: But I will sing of Your power; Yes, I will sing aloud of Your mercy in the morning; For You have been my defense And refuge in the day of my trouble.
To You, (Ps. 18:1) O my Strength, I will sing praises; For God is my defense, My God of mercy.

(Urgent Prayer for the Restored Favor of God) To the Chief Musician. (Ps. 80) Set to “Lily of the Testimony.” A Michtam of David. For teaching. (2 Sam. 8:3, 13; 1 Chr. 18:3) When he fought against Mesopotamia and Syria of Zobah, and Joab returned and killed twelve thousand Edomites in the Valley of Salt. [1] O God, (Ps. 44:9) You have cast us off; You have broken us down; You have been displeased; Oh, restore us again!
You have made the earth tremble; You have broken it; ((2 Chr. 7:14); Is. 30:26) Heal its breaches, for it is shaking.
(Ps. 71:20) You have shown Your people hard things; (Is. 51:17, 22; Jer. 25:15) You have made us drink the wine of confusion.
(Ps. 20:5; Is. 5:26; 11:12; 13:2) You have given a banner to those who fear You, That it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah
(Ps. 108:6-13) That Your beloved may be delivered, Save with Your right hand, and hear me.
God has (Ps. 89:35) spoken in His holiness: “I will rejoice; I will (Josh. 1:6) divide (Gen. 12:6) Shechem And measure out (Josh. 13:27) the Valley of Succoth.
